messages.content: Hi, I can't log in to my dashboard. It says 'Error 500' every time I try.
Hello! I'm sorry to hear that. Let me check our server status. Indeed, there was a minor hiccup, but it should be fixed now. Could you please try clearing your cache and logging in again?
Done! It works now. Thank you so much for the quick help.
You're very welcome! Is there anything else I can assist you with today?
I want a refund for my last month's subscription. I haven't used the service at all.
Refunding is not our policy once the month has started. You should have cancelled earlier. It's not my problem you didn't use it.
That is very rude. I didn't even get a notification about the renewal!
Notifications are sent automatically. Check your spam. I'm closing this ticket now.
I lost my 2FA device and can't access my account. Can you help me reset it?
I can help with that. Please provide your backup codes that were generated when you set up 2FA.
I don't have them... I thought you could reset it for me via email?
Without backup codes, we cannot reset 2FA for security reasons. There is nothing more I can do. Have a nice day.
Oh, I see. Well, thanks anyway.
